speech: The university campus is decent, green, clean with world class infrastructure.The campus has air-conditioned class rooms and tutorial rooms, ultra modern Auditorium and Seminar Hall with audio-visual aids.The campus possesses proper playgrounds and hard courts for outdoor sports. Separate decent boy’s and girl’s hostels with mess facility have attracted the attention of students.                                               24*7 central library with reading halls. Wi-Fi enabled library allows users to access offline and online information anytime. It uses Virtual Integrated Library Management Software (VTLS) and provides access to 22 databases through UGC-Infonet consortia. The campus also houses Human Resource Development Center|Guest Houses|Convention Center|Bank and ATM|Post Office|International Guest House|Conference and Seminar Hall|NKN Internet Connectivity.
